recipes.name: Pickled Green Strawberries
directions: Split the strawberries vertically and place in a glass jar with the bay leaf and mustard seeds
Simmer together the remaining ingredients for 20 minutes
Bring the pickling brine to a boil and strain over the strawberries
Seal and let pickle a few days before using.

recipes.name: Oi Kimchi (Cucumber)
directions: Cut cucumber into ~6 pieces and mix with salt for 20 min
Brush off salt and add the sauce; also add other veg if using
Keep at room temperature for 12-18 hours then refrigerate

recipes.name: Kung Pao
directions: Fry diced tofu until golden brown
Fry chili and Sichuan peppercorn until aromatic then add ginger, garlic and half the scallions
Once fragrent add tofu back in
Mix sauce ingredients together then pour into pand and stir fry
Top with peanuts and remaining scallions

recipes.name: Dan Dan Noodles

ingredients.name: Ya Cai
ingredients.alternative: Kim Chi without spice; Mustard Greens

ingredients.name: Sesame Paste
ingredients.preparation: Not Tahini; Roast and smash seeds

directions: Make the topping by heating oil in wok then fry star anise and Sichuan peppercorn on low until aromatic; Remove spices
Add minced pork and fry until slightly brown; Add cooking wine, sugar and light soy sauce
Add ya chi and fry for 3-5 min until golden brown
Mix seasonings and add to each bowl
Cook noodles and and blanch vegetables
Add noodles to serving bowls and top with fried topping, scallion and toasted peanuts
Pour ~½ C hot stock around edges; Mix then eat

recipes.name: Scallion Oil Noodles
directions: Cut onion 5-8 cm long
Heat oil in wok and add white parts of onion, garlic and ginger; fry until browned slightly
Add green parts of onion and fry until browned slightly
Remove from heat and add Sichuan peppercorn
Cook noodles then drain completely
Mix noodles with 1.5 Tbsp of oil; Add suce and mix; Top with crispy onion

recipes.name: Szechuan Pork
directions: Heat oil in wok and fry doubanjiang on a lower heat until oil is red
Add ginger, garlic, sichuan and scallion until aromatic
Add douchi
Add sprouts, peppers, sugar and pork
Add soy sauce and shaoxing around edge of pan and mix in quick (stir fry)
Serve over rice

recipes.name: Red Braised Pork Belly
directions: Sautee pork belly until crispy; remove and set aside
Sutee chili, anise, ginger, garlic until fragrant
add oil, sugar, light soy sauce until combined
add water and simmer ~1 min
add cinnamon, shaoxing wine, bay and green onion along with more water if needed
pour sauce over pork
top with more green onion if desired

recipes.name: Hot Oyster Noodles
directions: Boil water; cook noodles
While waiting; Pour oyster sauce in middle of dish and lay garlic, onion and both peppers around
Heat 2 Tbsp hot oil and drizzle on top of seasonings in dish
Add soy sauce, vinegar, sesame seeds; mix well
Add noodles and peanuts; mix; serve

recipes.name: Shui Zhu Mushrooms
directions: Heat 12-20 chilis then add sichuan peppercorn into wok until slightly aromatic; remove and rough chop
Add oil to wok then fre doubanjiang, ginger, white part of scallions, garlic until aromatic also
Add a third of the chilis and peppers then the water
Simmer ~10 minutes then add soy sauce, muchrooms and bean sprouts (optional)
Cook ~2 minutes and transfer to bowl(s); Top with green onion sections and remaning chili and peppercorn
Drizzle hot oil on top

recipes.name: Sweet and Sour Ribs (Tang Cu Pai Gu)
directions: Add cooking oil and smashed rock sugar in wok over low fire until turns dark
Add ribs and coat in the sugar
Pour enough water to cover, add light soy sauce, black vinegar and anise (optional)
Cover and simmer ~25 min over low flame
Remove lid, turn up to medium heat and reduce
Add 1 extra tablespoon of vinegar before transfering out
Garnish with sesame seeds and spring onion

recipes.name: Hoisin Pork
directions: Fry Pork to sear
Mix other ingredients
Pour over pork and fry hot until done
Pairs with steamed buns (Guo Bao)

recipes.name: Katsudon

ingredients.name: Oyster Sauce
ingredients.alternative: Lee Kum Kee Veg. Stir-Fry Sauce

directions: Cut the tofu into 4 pieces
Dredge, egg wash then bread the tofu
Fry in oil
Slice the onion and add it to a frying pan with the sauce
Once the sauce starts to boil reduce heat and add sliced Tokatsu (cutlet/tofu)
Cook for ~2 min
Slide onto bowl of rice
Drizzle with Kewpie mayo and tankatsu sauce
Add green onion or other toppings (seasame seeds, seaweed) as desired
Mix everything together
Japanese sauces are sweeter and less sour, so while the honey is optional it feels requried

recipes.name: Yakisoba
directions: Cook noodles to package specification
Drain and toss in sesame oil
Cook protein and veg in a bit of oil
Add sauce and noodles
Add aonori (dried seaweed/not the roasted kind (yakinori), tho you could use that) and benishōga (red pickled ginger) if you can find it

recipes.name: Sauce

ingredients.name: Dashi Powder
ingredients.preparation: Dissolved in ½ tsp hot water

directions: Mix together
Japanese ingredients are sweeter and less sour, more ketchup/sugar may be required and less Worcestershire

recipes.name: Yakibuta (Braised Pork)
directions: Add oil to pan and brown pork on all sides
Transfer pork to a deep pot and all the remaining ingredients; Bring to boil
Reduce heat and cook ~2 hours (depending on pork)
Put pork in ziplock or container and add sauce from pot to cover; Marinate overnight
Slice ~¼ in and serve with vegetables or ramen
If not using pork butt you can skip the whole boiling part, brown the tofu then marinate without boiling; add water only as may be needed

recipes.name: Oyako Don
directions: Mix seasonings; Makes ~1 C
Cut onion into wedges and chicken into bite sized pieces
In pan over medium heat add the seasoning (can do half if making seperate bowls); Bring to simmer
Add the chicken and onion

recipes.name: Sundubu Jjigae (Tofu Stew)

ingredients.name: Fish Sauce
ingredients.alternative: half soy sauce half rice vinegar

directions: Heat oil and add garlic and chili powder
Add fish and soy sauce and stock; Bring to boil
Add tofu, mushrooms, egg and cook 2-3 min
Add sesame oil, green onion, S&P

recipes.name: Cold Kimchi Noodles
directions: Cook noodles according to package (al dente)
Cool under cold water ~1 min then drain well
Mix noodles and sauce with kimchi in a bowl
Place cucumber and egg on top

recipes.name: Quiche Lorraine
directions: Add flour and baking powder in food processor
Add butter and pulse a few seconds at a time until butter chucks are small (pea size)
Add water and egg and pulse until dough just begins to form
Add more water if needed then remove and form a disc; Roll out dough and put on quiche plate
Prick bottom of crust with fork and refrigerate 30 min or freeze 15 min
Cook bacon, then add everything in a bowl, then power into crust (can also pre-cook onion)
Bake at 375 for 45 min

recipes.name: White Bean Cassoulet
directions: Melt butter; sauté onion, celery, carrot 8–10 min; add garlic.
Add veg ham + sausage; lightly brown.
Stir in tomato paste, paprika, nutmeg; cook 1 min.
Deglaze w/ white wine; reduce by half.
Add beans, ½ cup broth, parmesan rind, thyme, bay leaf; stir.
Simmer 20–25 min until thick; add broth only if needed.
Transfer to oven dish; cover and bake 350°F for 35–45 min.
(Optional) Top w/ buttered breadcrumbs; bake uncovered 10–15 min.
Rest 10–15 min; serve w/ baguette

recipes.name: Nutmeg — ⅛ tsp
directions: Mix everything and top (see above for time)
Careful with garlic to not burn

recipes.name: Pumpkin Gnocchi
directions: Bake pumpkin 1 hr at 350 until soft
Push pumpkin thru sieve
Add eggs, zest, parm, nutmeg, s&p
Add flour and stir until mixture starts to come away from sides of the bowl (add more flour if needed)
Drop dough by teaspoons or use piping bag into boiling water; Cook ~2 min or until they float
Heat butter in pan then add sage leaves; When leaves start to change colour add lemon juice and gnocchi
Top with parm and pepper

recipes.name: Rabo de Toro (Oxtail Stew)
directions: Flour the oxtail and brown; Remove from pot
Saute leek, garlic, red pepper and tomato ~10 min
Add carrot, bay leaf, ginger, cloves and saute ~1 min
Add oxtail and cover with wine and stock
Bring to a boil; Reduce and simmer ~3 hours
Remove oxtail and puree the sauce (not required, but nice)

recipes.name: Smoky Indoor Ribs
directions: Clean ribs of excess fat and membrane
Mix water with liquid smoke and marrinate ribs for an hour (ziplock bag)
Season both sides of rubs with salt and spice rub then wrap in foil
Cook at 225 for 2 hours in the oven
Remove ribs from foil and place back in oven meaty side up for another 2 hours
Flip meaty side down and add BBQ sauce to bone side then broil 5 min (or until sauce starts to bubble)

recipes.name: Meatloaf

ingredients.name: Chipotle
ingredients.preparation: In adobo; the sauce is needed

directions: Whisk glaze ingredients together
Add croutons, chilli powerder, thyme, pepper to food processor and pulse to coarse crumb; Set aside in mixing bowl
Add onion, bell pepper, carrot and garlic to food processor and pulse until finely chopped; Add to mixing bowl
Add beyond ground round to mixing bowl; add salt
Mix together with hands, quickly add egg once mixed
Pack meat mixture in 9x5x3 loaf pan then turn it over onto a sheet pan with parchment
Bake ~15 minutes at 325; Remove and brush with glaze; Return to oven
Bake another 45-60 minutes; Let rest 10-20 minutes once done
Serve with 1/4 glaze for dipping

recipes.name: Tamal Dough w/ Masa Harina
directions: Combine shortening, salt, baking powder and mix med-high until whipped (~1 min)
Add 25% of the masa at a time until throughly incorporated
Slowly add stock until it is the consistancy of hummus
Mix in chili sauce, if using
Test by dropping ½ tsp ball into water, if it floats it is ready; Add more shortening if it sinks
